page.title: 05 CHARLECOTE & HAMPTON LUCY
page.content: The villages of Charlecote and Hampton Lucy have a combined population of 773. The population of Hampton Lucy is slowly growing, but conservation laws forbid the construction of new buildings at Charlecote. Some of the people work at the nearby National Vegetable Research Station,and others work on the farms,at the local hotel,or commute to Coventry. Hampton Lucy has a Women's Institute and a Mothers and Toddlers Group, and the Hampton Lucy Players provide entertainment from time to time. Charlecote Park is the main tourist attraction in the area. There is a church in each village, with one vicar who lives in Charlecote.
